events.name: Conversations: The Race to the Next Frontier
events.description:
Conversations: The Race to the Next Frontier
Tue 14 Feb | 4pm - 5.30pm
Expression Gallery, Level 4
Free. Register in the lobby. 
Admission is on a first come first serve basis. Please come early as spaces are limited. 

For the first time in Singapore, engage with Dr Dava Newman, Apollo Program Professor Chair MIT and Dr David Oh, Project Systems Engineer & Former Lead Flight Director, Curiosity Mars Rover, NASA Jet Propulsion Lab (JPL). Sharing their insights on NASA’s journey to Mars and how the scientific exploration of the JPL missions have changed our understanding of the solar system, Dr Newman and Dr Oh will also discuss the impact of Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, Math and Design (STEAMD) education and NASA’s newest Discovery Mission: Psyche, Journey to a Metal World will reach new frontiers.

Programme
4pm Welcome by Moderator, Glenn van Zutphen, Veteran Journalist and Ex-President of the Foreign Correspondents Association (FCA)
4.05pm Introduction by ArtScience Museum
4.10pm  Dr Dava Newman, Apollo Program Professor Chair MIT
4.40pm  Dr David Oh, Project Systems Engineer & Former Lead Flight Director, Curiosity Mars Rover, NASA
5.10pm Q&A
5.30pm End

This programme is part of the Art and Science of Space season

events.name: Getting started with editing a VR 360 video.
events.description:
With the increasing popularity and different application of 360 VR, it is important to discuss an import issue that comes naturally with video: Editing. Ever since the first continuity cut was used in 1898 by Rober W. Paul, there has been a development of rules in film montage in which film makers “abide by” such as the 180 degree rule and match action cuts. Speaker Lynus Hee has recently been concluded a year-long research into this area of 360 VR video editing and will share his findings. So if you don’t have anyone to celebrate Valentine’s day with, head on down to Toa Payoh Library at 7p.m.

Register Here
https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/creative-crew-talks-feb-meeting-2017-tickets-31537700110
events.location: Toa Payoh Public Library, 6 Toa Payoh Central, Singapore 319191
